commands.select_command: SELECT * FROM football.top_scorers WHERE league_id = %s AND season = %s;
commands.insert_command: INSERT INTO football.top_scorers (league_id, season, player_id, rank, played, goals, assists) VALUES (%s, %s, %s, %s, %s, %s, %s);
commands.update_command: UPDATE football.top_scorers SET {} WHERE league_id = %s AND season = %s AND player_id = %s;
